title: Transformative Social Learning Experience Design Using Narrative Distance

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic social issues and digital device usage skills
context.additional_context: Learners indirectly experience social conflict scenarios through VR simulations, exploring solutions based on personal experiences and knowledge

learning_goals: After experiencing diverse social contexts through VR simulations, learners can write reflective journals incorporating personal experiences using narrative distance
In team-based projects, learners can apply narrative distance techniques to propose creative solutions for social problems and improve them through peer evaluation and feedback
By the end of the 6-month course, learners can design small-scale educational simulations for solving community problems based on VR scenario design principles
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
